isis.stitle: ALTERNATOR: DELCO-REMY 10-SI SERIES, TYPE 116 - REPAIR PROCEDURES - BRUSH HOLDER AND REGULATOR REPLACEMENT

svcproc.title: BRUSH HOLDER AND REGULATOR REPLACEMENT

important.para: To determine if the regulator is defective, an approved regulator tester must be used.

svcproc.para: After removing the three attaching nuts, the stator, and diode trio screw ( Figure 8) the brush holder and regulator may be replaced by removing the two remaining screws. Note the two insulators located over the top of the brush clips in Figure 6. These two screws have special insulating sleeves over the screw body above the threads. The third mounting screw may or may not have an insulating sleeve. If not, this screw must not be interchanged with either one of the other two screws, as a ground may result, causing no output. Regulators may vary in appearance but are completely interchangeable.
